body_html: Thanks for the quick reply and thanks for investigating it, @fmassa . More environmental infos: anaconda2 + torch_0.3.1 installed from pip, the backend used is gloo. When start training, dataloader works well and will feed the data into gpus, after filling a batch to do the first forward or maybe backward procedure, the workers of dataloader will stop and the whole training hangs.

body: Thanks for the quick reply and thanks for investigating it, @fmassa .  More environmental infos: `anaconda2` + `torch_0.3.1` installed from `pip`, the backend used is `gloo`. When start training, `dataloader` works well and will feed the data into gpus, after filling a batch to do the first forward or maybe backward procedure, the workers of `dataloader` will stop and the whole training hangs.
